website_summaries.verdict: Convenient way to take water with you while you are walking with your dog.
pros: Dogs seems to enjoy drinking out of it
Easy push button access to the water
Bottle has a lock to help prevent leakage
Water slides easily back in the bottle if your dog does not drink it all
cons: The biggest drawback of this water bottle is that it only holds 10 ounces of water

customer_reviews.title: Finally found my perfect on-the-go dog water dispenser
customer_reviews.text: Note - this one will be super for a SMALL dog or a short walk with a big dog, since it only holds about a cup of water. For my little MinPin, it's perfect. And I guess with a larger dog or multiple dogs you could reload it from your own water container. Anyway, I've ordered several types of water holders for long walks with my dog, and this is the best one yet. Doesn't leak, handy loop to carry with, and the fact that I can fill and draw back the water with just a press of my thumb is super - I'm not pitching it if I pour too much out. Buddy and I like it very much!
customer_reviews.author: LAURIE J KNOWLES

customer_reviews.title: No more "poop bag" water bowl
customer_reviews.text: Saw this little device at dog park. I quickly ordered it on Amazon and love it! Perfect for my 12 pounds Havanese. It might be a little small for a bigger dog. My dog loves the little stream as the water flows into the cup. For the water he didn't finish, I could easily revert it back into the bottle. Perfect little device! Not more "poop bag" water bowl to avoid the communal water bowl!!
customer_reviews.author: M Ko

customer_reviews.title: Hecka convenient and cute
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to use for a road trip from SoCal to NorCal and it was a lifesaver! We got the small bottle for our maltipoo terrier mix and it's the perfect size for him. Super convenient and so much better than having to carry around a collapsible bowl and a bottle of water. We haven't had any issues with water leakage or any dispensing problems and it seems pretty durable seeing as I've tossed it into my backpack a couple of times when I'm rushing to head out with the dog. Definitely recommending this to my friends with larger dogs and hoping their dogs love it as well!
customer_reviews.author: Ashleigh

customer_reviews.title: Nifty, drinking gadget!
customer_reviews.text: Very nifty gadget, my dog usually only drinks out of her bowl however after a long walk to the park and presented water in this bowl and she sipped happily! It's a great size and fits perfectly in my water bottle on the outside of my gym bag. I do like that you can save the water, however I usually just throw it on the grass if I know I'm going directly home. All in all, great item and would definitely recommended to all dog owners.
customer_reviews.author: waneda_o

customer_reviews.title: Works Awesome for Active Pups
customer_reviews.text: I take my dog for about 3 runs a week and with the hot summer weather he often times gets thirst. This Dog Water Bottle worked great, it doesn't leak and doesn't require me to carry a bottle and a dish! This is a WINNING product for dog owners that like to take their dogs on walks/runs in the summer heat. Great product, highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia Bessette

customer_reviews.title: Best travel water bottle for pets
customer_reviews.text: I love it! Doesn’t leak, and water that doggo doesn’t drink goes right back into the tank with a press of the button! My one complaint is that I wish they made the side of the bottle flat so that you have the option to lay the bottle down for dog to drink from without it rolling or tipping over. The bottle does stay put IF the surface you’re resting it on is level AND your dog isn’t clumsy.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Lamb

customer_reviews.title: Genius product!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best invention! Works wonderful for my dogs! I don't know how I survived traveling with my fur babies before I had one of these. Many people have stopped and asked me where I found it. Of course, I tell them AMAZON, where else. Very convenient to carry and use. Easy to clean. The opening is big enough to be able to add a few ice cubes if you need. My dogs are 5lb and 6lb so this is just the right size for them!
customer_reviews.author: Ree S.

customer_reviews.title: Not for large dogs
customer_reviews.text: Very nice water bottle but would not work to well for larger dogs. It will hold just enough water for our usual 1 day road trip with 2 smaller dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Bella

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work.
customer_reviews.text: As a dispenser it’s terrible!! The valve that lets water in and back doesn’t work. It’s brand new and we just use it for water. I literally use it as a water bottle that I have to unscrew the cap, pour it into the bowl and toss out what’s left over. I didn’t need a special gizmo for that. I detest companies that sell low quality crap hoping the consumer will have to follow up with repairs on poorly made items. It’s bad enough when it’s a complicated item like a disk drive but for a pet water bottle it’s onscene.
customer_reviews.author: Lorenrenee

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Our dog and I love this! She loves drinking fresh water so having it right there on walks is awesome, it's big enough to hold an adequate amount of water for my boxer but small enough that it doesn't get heavy or awkward to hold. I love this and I highly recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Rubeo

customer_reviews.title: Not a consistent water tight seal
customer_reviews.text: I am a professional dog walker and was really hoping this product would be a solution for my thirsty pups. The first day of use, the strap broke but I thought that was minor and would make it work for me. However, despite being very careful when closing the water container, making sure the rubber seal is placed correctly, water consistently leaks. I have tried repeatedly to be patient with this but am fed up and disappointed. Too bad I missed the return date by just a few days! I guess I will have to try to find another portable travel water cup for my fur clients!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great dog bottle...ring will overstretch
customer_reviews.text: This is just perfect. I had other ones that I didn't like. My dog is small so the smaller size is perfect. So far there isnt any leakage. My dog likes it alot which is the most important thing. The color is a very nice aqua. I love it. Very fast shipping too. UPPDATE: After one use, I rinsed it out. The rubber leak ring stretched so big I couldn't use it. I used it without it and put it in my pocket . It leaked down my jacket and my pocket book.....
customer_reviews.author: Micki

customer_reviews.title: Leak-proof, perfect for traveling!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this one, because I love the color but also because the one that I have leaked. Decided to give this one a try. The whole thing is made of plastic. Comes with a wrist strap and an extra rubber seal/ring. I'm very pleased to say it does not leak and you can also let the water go back down in the bottle if you have no place to dispose. I'm quite happy with this and know that all my doggy friends are going to end up wanting one for their pets also. I see no reason why this won't hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Harmon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for traveling
customer_reviews.text: Love this little doggie water bowl. No issues with leaks yet, seems to have a good seal. Love the locking switch for when it's not in use as it helps to ensure no leaks. Nice to be able to carry water for the pup with a bowl already integrated and not have to carry extra item around. Also, easy to put water back into bottle when pup is done so we aren't wasting water. Best little device for traveling with pup. He loves it as well, knows what it is when I bring it out and starts drinking before I finish filling the bowl with water.
customer_reviews.author: Majaji

customer_reviews.title: Careful introducing it to your dog...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product! Such a great idea and useful for giving pets drinks and still having a leak-proof container! One thing to be careful of if you have a somewhat timid dog like ours, don't let them too close when you first click the features to get water into the bowl. Our dog had her cute little face really close and the click startled her....so we had to slowly reintroduce her to it (putting treats in the bowl part!). Just a helpful FYI. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen J. Prosapio

customer_reviews.title: Works good, but could be a little better!
customer_reviews.text: I like the concept of this bottle, but wish there were a couple things different. I which the water compartment held more water (holds approximately one cup). I wish it had small feet on one side, so you could set it on it’s side without rolling over and spilling out! This product works perfect when I hold the bottle sideways for my dog, but it would be perfect if it would lay on it’s side, so I could leave it for my dog to drink from while I’m away from my vehicle for short periods.
customer_reviews.author: Nofundunn

customer_reviews.title: Best traveling water dispenser ever!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best traveling water dish that we have ever purchased. Although, right now are travel is limited to our golf cart. We live in a 55+ Community and are not allowed to walk our dogs inside the park so we take our dogs for a ride every day outside of our park to go for a walk. This travel dish is the perfect size and we love that you can just let out a small amount of water at a time. Then, whatever water is left good back inside the bottle!
customer_reviews.author: Jackiejean49

customer_reviews.title: Really easy to use and it’s convenient
customer_reviews.text: The 12oz size dog water bottle is perfect for a small or medium sized dog and I don’t have to worry about wasting water. You can put the extra water back into the container so that it ends up lasting longer. This is really convenient and I tie it to my purse while I am walking so that I do not have to worry about holding it.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: A life saver
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my Guide Dog since I live in Florida. GREAT! GREAT! GREAT! It has a push button to fill the bowl. He loves it and it is easy to water him. This is a life saver for my Stonewall.
customer_reviews.author: ANTHONY TRUSCELLO

customer_reviews.title: Not silicone, but plastic
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for a dog I was dogsitting. It worked out great! Initially I was a bit disappointed since I was expecting it to be made of silicone, but plastic worked just fine. It’s great because I don’t have to waste any water the dog doesn’t drink and instead save it for later. At the same time, I wish the strap was made of something waterproof like silicone or something, instead of fabric. I also wish it came in more appealing colors. But overall very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous but doesn’t last!
customer_reviews.text: This product was amazing for about a week, a total staple. However after about a week it stopped working. The water doesn’t flow in and out anymore and it hasn’t fallen or anything to have caused it.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Finnegan

customer_reviews.title: Works greats!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for hot summer walks! You push the button and the water comes out, then push the button again and the water can go back in. The lock doesn’t work great, but you really don’t need it. The water doesn’t come out unless you push the button to make it do so. My dog loves it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Our dog uses his on every hike.
customer_reviews.text: We really like the size and ease of taking it along in the car, on hikes, wherever we go. We have used this since our dog was a puppy and it is really very handy to have. While on hikes other people have observed our Murphy Girl drinking from it and have been very interested in ordering the same for their dogs. It is also nice because what water they don’t drink, you can easily push the button and it will go back into the water bottle. A great invention for dogs and the price is so worth it!
customer_reviews.author: KC...GWS

customer_reviews.title: A perfect invention
customer_reviews.text: So easy to use it's crazy!!! Take it with me all the time and everywhere. Good material and it's really leak proof and it has a lock to make sure it's not going to leak inside your bag. My corgi loves it and we use it a lot, car rides or at the park.
customer_reviews.author: MARIA VICTORIA DE SOUZA PEREIRA

customer_reviews.title: Perfect leak-proof bottle!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product! My dog loves to drink from this bottle when we take him on hikes. And this bottle is leak proof just like advertised, just make sure to attach the plastic gasket on correctly. I highly recommend this bottle if your dog is picky with where he drinks water.
customer_reviews.author: kathyngn

customer_reviews.title: Great for walks
customer_reviews.text: We take this around town and on walks. My 6lb dog wants the bottle put on the ground for her to drink out of like a bowl. My pitbull puppy drinks from it like a bottle. She has got into the habit of barking, standing on her hind legs and pawing at it when she is thirsty. We got the small size which works for us. It fits in my boyfriend’s short’s pocket. I wear it around my wrist.
customer_reviews.author: Natascha Hood

customer_reviews.title: Works kind of.... for a while....
customer_reviews.text: EDIT... after about a year of use it no longer locks. So no matter what if you push the button, the water comes out. And keep in mind, we don’t use it very often so it’s not from wear and tear. Kind of disappointed that it didn’t last longer. Easy to use. I’ve had no problems with leaking. My dog drinks out of it just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Guyer

customer_reviews.title: Can I give more than 5 stars?
customer_reviews.text: My dog is MISERABLE on roadtrips because he won't drink out of anything. We've tried all kinds of containers. I don't what the difference is with this thing, but it works! And to have the water just drain back into the container is amazing. Ya, it's super slow to pour out and go back in, but whatever, it works amazingly.
customer_reviews.author: T. Pen

customer_reviews.title: Spill proof, clean doggie water
customer_reviews.text: This doggie waterer is awesome, nice size bowl for did to drink out of. It features a lock on the button so it can't accidently dispense when thrown into a bag. I like the fact that after your pick is done drinking you this the water aside unlike some other doggie waterer bottles that suck all the water back in. Good size for a walk or short trip, bring extra water to refill for an all day trip!
customer_reviews.author: Allen

customer_reviews.title: Stay tuned, jury is out
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in pieces (bottle part, scoop part & a rubber ring that should have been secure in the cap part) looks like by accident. Obviously easy to put back and seems to work fine but definitely feels cheaply made. Tested it with my dog and he drank out of it fine. Just got it today so will be interesting how long it lasts, I don’t have high hopes but will keep it to see. Has high hopes but not so much now. Will update as necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Kim N.

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Great when travelling doesn't leak easy to use. My Dog appreciates it. I half fill the tank with frozen water then add water for on the go. Water stays cold for a good amount of time depending on the weather. I also purchased one for my Mother she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Chic

customer_reviews.title: Great Idea, could be made better
customer_reviews.text: Just received this, will keep it, but it does have issues. The strap broke as I was trying to put it on, and the seal does not work perfectly. It also is not that big, so does not hold alot of water. I wanted it to keep in our car to give our dogs a drink if they need it, so works for that. If it had been more expensive I would have returned it. For the price, it is ok.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Dobson

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Water Dispenser for travel and hiking! Wish I had purchased sooner.
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant gadget for my fur baby. We traveled across country by car and it was wonderful to be able to access water for her then let what she didn’t drink trickle back into bottle. Perfect size too. You must be sure the rubber seal is on for it to be completely leakproof...for those who said it leaked. I may get a few as gifts. Love it. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: NOT silicone as advertised. Seems functional enough though.
customer_reviews.text: I couldn’t give it 5 stars because it was mislabeled/advertised as silicone and nowhere on the bottle is there silicone, unless you count the inner ring sealing the bottle. Was hoping to get away from plastic. Also nowhere does the actual item or box say BPA-free, so I’m hoping it is. We will only be using it a few times a year for vacation, so it will do the job, but I wish it were properly advertised and labeled in the listing.
customer_reviews.author: B. Cheek

customer_reviews.title: Leaks everywhere
customer_reviews.text: The lock switch doesn’t really work. The button can still partially press when the lock engages, and water leaks out everywhere. Basically useless as a result. EDIT: Contacted seller and they sent a replacement. Same problem, though. But I’m still updating my review to add some stars. I’ve actually found this to be quite convenient despite this flaw. I bring it to a bar or park empty and fill it up there. As long as you don’t throw it in your bag you’re fine.
customer_reviews.author: Jamison

customer_reviews.title: This can NOT go in the dishwasher
customer_reviews.text: I know somewhere it says that, but usually when something says not to put in the dishwasher, and you accidentally wash it in the dishwasher, your item survives. This item did NOT survive its journey through the dishwasher. Well, let me clarify: the top part did leave the dishwasher intact. The bottle part, however, well...let me just say that I was not even sure what it was! It shriveled up so small, it looked like a doll's toy. Since we only used this item one time, I can't really speak to its other qualities. We did get my dog to drink out of it, so that was good. Unfortunately, I'll have to buy another one (different brand).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: works good with "cone accessorized" dog
customer_reviews.text: Our dog initially did not like it ( compared to her bowl). She then got spaded. She then got a cone put on her head like in the rent.com commercial with the dog ( so that she couldn't pick at her wound). She had difficulty drinking from her bowl. The water bottle with the spout fits nicely in the cone.
customer_reviews.author: blabla

customer_reviews.title: Great for picky pups
customer_reviews.text: Great product, we always had troubke getting our matlese to drink from a bottle on walks but with the bowl shape he drinks easily from this. The bottle itself doesn't leak but the hole where the water pours into the bowl does leak a bit even when "locked". It hasn't been an inconvenience so far but figured I'd mention it.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Offhaus

customer_reviews.title: Mess free!
customer_reviews.text: Love this travel bottle! Since getting our new goldendoodle puppy, we have been doing a lot of traveling in the car. This bottle has been a perfect and mess free option to keep our guy hydrated while on the road—and so much better than trying to keep a bowl of water from spilling! It is also easy to take to the vet or on walks so you are not worried about fumbling around with a separate bowl and water bottle. The lock works great to keep it from leaking, and I love that you can easily drain the water back into the bottle if your pup doesn’t drink it all! Definitely recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor W.

customer_reviews.title: This is a great water bottle to use while traveling with your dog
customer_reviews.text: The first water bottle I received, the seal was to big and it leaked. They where prompt with sending a new bottle and allowed me 30 days to return the first one. We used it with our dog on a 9 hour trip to Florida and it was a great way to allow your dog to drink while in the car, no spills and the unused water went back into the bottle. Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Elke Mcleroy

customer_reviews.title: Works great for my traveling pug!!
customer_reviews.text: Just received this item. The pug likes it. Test runs worked out great. You can’t beat the price for this item. Read some reviews about the rubber gasket not working or missing. I decided to give it a shot because the price was right. To my surprise My order came with an EXTRA rubber gasket. I also love the included little wristlet to hold it.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie ATop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Pouring lock doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: The first item I received was deformed to the point that it could not be assembled - looked like the plastic had melted during manufacturing or something. I returned it and got a new bottle which looked much better. However, the little lock switch does not have any effect at all. No matter which position it is in, the water will be dispensed when the dispensing button is pressed. The bottle works fine for my usage, which is in a side pocket in my backpack with the water bottle pointing down. I would not leave it loose in a backpack as it will start leaking if something presses on it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good travel pet water bottle
customer_reviews.text: At last, found a very convenient travel water bottle for my dog. Good size so it fits into my handbag easily. Water comes out on to the cup and the residue water goes back in as specified. Only issue I had was that you have to really be careful when closing it as it looks like it has closed but then it leaks a bit. So watch out on that. Else it's a great water bottle, I have been searching for one for a long time and found one that fits my purpose very well.
customer_reviews.author: Paromita Ghosh

customer_reviews.title: Great invention for traveling dogs
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful item if you travel a lot with your dog. This is the third one I have bought because the gasket eventually fails and it starts to leak. My only suggestion would be to include an extra gasket with purchase. Otherwise, it wiukd have gotten all 5’s. Fantastic idea!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Troutman

customer_reviews.title: Best doggy water bottle!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome! It's super easy to use and carry. It fits easily in all my cupholders in the car. Best part is, you can put the water back in the bottom part super easily, so you don't waste any water your dog doesn't drink! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Fay

customer_reviews.title: Not very durable
customer_reviews.text: I really did like this travel bowl, my dogs liked it too. However, I left it in my car in the garage over night. I didn't even think about it. Then I went to use it today the heat had made it warp and shrink. I even had a water bottle in there at the same time, and it was fine. Like a cheap thin plastic water bottle... So I am not sure how durable these are. So don't leave it in your car like I did!
customer_reviews.author: Alyssalu5

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, good quality. It doesn't leak. So much more convenient than bringing a wattle bottle along with a bowl. My dog loves it. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Handy device to water your animal
customer_reviews.text: We really liked the idea of this watering bowl when we saw it, and having used it for our small dog several times now, we are not disappointed, and the dog is comfortable using it. No wasted water either, as you can return it to the jar easily. Really a nice pet tool!
customer_reviews.author: A. Stobie

customer_reviews.title: Leaks, but still recommend
customer_reviews.text: This is a great item to travel with, it’s easy to fill up, and you can also push the button to have the water go back in if your dog doesn’t drink it all. However, it leaks pretty bad, so I always make sure mine is sitting straight up in my cup holder when in transit. Also, don’t put it in the dishwasher. It says that, but really don’t. It warps and shrinks the base, so I had to buy another one to replace that.
customer_reviews.author: L.G.

customer_reviews.title: Really does not leak
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about the product not leaking but it is true. The water does not flow/leak unless you push the button to unlock. I would have a bottle of water and a collapsable container for dogs now I just have to walk with this. Less load to carry around in doggie bag.
customer_reviews.author: Bucky

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great idea. Works really good. If it had one downside in my opinion, it would be the flow of water into the bowl. Seems a little slow. However, it does work and it’s convenient and easy to pack away for trips. We take it with us all the time for our tiny pup.
customer_reviews.author: Markus White

customer_reviews.title: My dog refuses to drink out of this
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one, and for some reason my dog refuses to drink out of this one only. I've tried washing it many times, but she will not drink out of it! If I pour the water into my hand she will drink it but won't put her face into the drinking area even though she still does with my other one!
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: very good for my puppy
customer_reviews.text: I have small puppy and really work for him. I think I can use till he become for adult. I ordered from diffeent seller but was broken. I order from this seller and works well! easy to carry and used. thank you
customer_reviews.author: Han

customer_reviews.title: My 18 lb doggy loves it!
customer_reviews.text: This item works great! You can fill it from the tap at home (prior to going to the dog park), or bring a regular bottle of water with you to fill up the cup with. My dog has no problem drinking from the attached cup and it's nice and smallish so I can keep it in the car. All in all, a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: JaneOPks

customer_reviews.title: Our dog loves it
customer_reviews.text: Our puppy loves this. We started going on longer hikes as he has gotten older and we carried those collapsible bowls previously and a water bottle. This allows us to leave the collapsible bowl at home. I would say even with it locked, if you press the button hard enough a little water will still come out...but has not been an issue for us. It hasn’t leaked in our bag yet...just an observation I made.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Sailors

customer_reviews.title: A MUST HAVE FOR EVERY TRAVELING DOG OWNER
customer_reviews.text: This is an absolutely wonderful water bottle for any pooch! It is very easy to use and the best part ... the water left in the cup after the pup drinks easily returns into the bottle! This makes it much more convenient for all day trips... never having to take several bottles of water because you don't waste the water they don't drink! It has been the most convenient item I've purchased for my pup!
customer_reviews.author: DACtor

customer_reviews.title: Its great no complaints!
customer_reviews.text: Its pretty great! It does leak small drips pretty consistently... but my dog is super picky about using a traveling water bowl, and he used this! We were shocked! So for us its worth the leak. Note: we had to teach him how to use it it took 2 days, now he's a champ!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda M.

customer_reviews.title: Serves its purpose, but isn’t “out of this world”.
customer_reviews.text: I got this to take on walks with my 9 lb. shih tzu. It’s convenient and works for the purpose. I find the button is a bit finicky and is often hard to make the water stop dispensing. The size is great for her to drink from, but if she was much bigger it would be hard for her to get her nose in there to drink and also the bottle wouldnt hold enough water. But, it’s sufficient for my little fur baby in this hot Florida heat.
customer_reviews.author: Nthesun

customer_reviews.title: Can be much better
customer_reviews.text: This is a good idea product but has many flaws atm. The bottle leaks if you put it on it’s side or upside down. You gotta screw the cap on tight which makes it harder to open later. The water comes out at such a slow rate that I just pour the water from the bottle. The locking mechanism is a joke and doesn’t work at all. It’s a little small for my dog but that’s not there fault.
customer_reviews.author: D.

customer_reviews.title: Great idea
customer_reviews.text: Great dog idea. All the other dog water bottles i have either leaks or you have to squeeze. I love this one because it's just a button and if my dog doesn't want anymore water, i can retract it. I do not have to waste water.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: We use this for the plane! It’s super easy to fill and will stay upright for when my dog needs to drink out of it with out me having to hold it like some of the other ones. The one thing I don’t like is the button that you slide to lock the mechanism that dispenses water stopped working after 1 trip to SF.
customer_reviews.author: Liaj

customer_reviews.title: Leaks
customer_reviews.text: This product seems cheaply made and frequently leaks which makes it hard to pack with you on the go. Also, this could be personal preference but my dog hates drinking from it and he will typically drink from anything.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Mozolic

customer_reviews.title: Does what it's supposed to do ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a good product. Unfortunately I bought the wrong size - too small for my water-loving dog. I kept it though for short walks around the neighborhood on hot days. And I'm buying a larger one for long hikes well beyond the neighborhood!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Hare

customer_reviews.title: LEAKS
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product, just wish it didnt leak. It can not be turned sideways or it will leak. We even double checked the seal to make sure it was on right and it still leaks. It worked other than that and it was great on our road trip, just had to make sure it stayed upright.
customer_reviews.author: Krystal Covey

customer_reviews.title: Great for doggy walks
customer_reviews.text: This is great for small walks . My dog always gets thirsty during walking. The bottle is not too big so you can put it in a small backpack It doesn’t leak at all plus it includes a locking mechanism for extra safety .
customer_reviews.author: NadZ

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Great for walks, car rides, and just sitting on our back patio on warm days. I saw a similar product on a Facebook ad but it cost almost triple the price as this one. Happy with this purchase. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Saram

customer_reviews.title: A must have.
customer_reviews.text: This is a must for anyone who travels with their loyal companions. I take my Puggle for long hikes a few days a week. I fill this bottle up and throw it in my bag for her. This thing does not leak, and you also can transfer the water back into the bottle if your dog does not drink it all from the dish. My dog figured out pretty quickly how to use this. Now she sees me take it from my bag, and immediately springs over to drink. Do not have any doubts when buying. This was worth every penny!!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this bottle!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this bottle! I bought mine in November and it’s still like brand new. I only use it when me and my pup travel or go on long walks/hikes. He enjoys drinking from it and I like that his water stays clean. The switch to lock and unlock the bottle is a little hard to move sometimes but it’s still nice!
customer_reviews.author: MGS

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This was awesome for on a trip w our fur baby. Wayyy cool design and awesome that can put water easily back in if she didn’t drink it all. Took it hiking and everything. She drank out of it easily.
customer_reviews.author: Bvr&Jsr

customer_reviews.title: Great little bottle for my pup
customer_reviews.text: I love the size of this bottle as it's easy to grip and the wrist strap is very helpful. It doesn't seem to lock as when I switch it with on or off the pour button still works. I fill it halfway with water and freeze it for these hot Arizona days, love that it stays cold that way through our 3 mile morning walks.
customer_reviews.author: Gabby

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this before a 6 week camping trip. LOVED the product! -1 Star for minor leakage around the seal. I introduced several pet parents to it during my travels. Fix the leak problem and I’d buy it again! Great for a smaller dog, although might need a larger one for a larger dog.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Mcginty

customer_reviews.title: Water capacity for a small dog
customer_reviews.text: In the advertizement, the water capacity seemed larger than it actually is....if you have a medium or small dog, these will probably be ok for you....german shepherd not so much.
customer_reviews.author: R. Bayless

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel
customer_reviews.text: This is great for travelling and we have used it in the car. It is really helpful to have the bowl connected right to it and be able to feed the water back into the container. It doesnt hold a lot of water so we just carry a separate water bottle to refill it as needed.
customer_reviews.author: JMarker

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 2 uses
customer_reviews.text: Initially I was excited to have this water bottle in the car for after we left dog parks. I used it twice successfully and it was really helpful to have. The third time I went to use it the water no longer flowed through the bottle. Disappointed that it doesn't work anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Giniewski LLC

customer_reviews.title: Locking feature broken quickly
customer_reviews.text: The locking feature broke within a month of barely using. Really love the idea and have taken it hiking with my bud a couple times with great success. However after only several uses the locking feature broke so now water will come out after pressing the button anytime. Much more likely to leak
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Thing we Brought for a Long Car Ride
customer_reviews.text: Gone are the days of finding containers to give the dog a drink while on the road, and tossing the water. This has saved the day, and no water waste when my dog doesn't really want a drink. Fits in the car drink holders. Everyone who travels with a dog should have this!
customer_reviews.author: Cosmo Dog

customer_reviews.title: Leakproof!
customer_reviews.text: I love this! We have hiking Sunday’s and I usually have to take a Tupperware bowl along with me to give our dogs water. This took the hassle out of that and it’s leak proof. I love the locking mechanism on this.
customer_reviews.author: Alejandra

customer_reviews.title: Works well for me
customer_reviews.text: Keep by bedside for days I am bed bound. My cat has 2 gravity fed water bowlsand but sometimes wants me to hold his water while he drinks🙄 After a week, no leaks yet.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: The Dog Likes It
customer_reviews.text: Our dog likes drinking from his new water bottle. The first time I used it, it leaked a little (I probably didn't tighten it correctly). It's a little clunky and doesn't hold a lot of water, but he loves drinking from it, so that's all that really matters :).
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Great travel bottle
customer_reviews.text: It took a while for my dogs to get use to the product but when they figured it out they enjoyed using it on our walks. It travels well and I like taking it with me on long walks. I like that the access water can go right back into the bottle for later use. I love not wasting water. It easy to use just push the butten and water come out push while titling it upwards water goes back in.
customer_reviews.author: Amethyst

customer_reviews.title: A MUST HAVE for travel/surgeries/dog park!
customer_reviews.text: The best invention! I bought 2. Now that he just had surgery and wears a cone this IS PERFECT! No wasted water either... No leaking! No mess!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer A Dal Ceredo

customer_reviews.title: Leak Proof!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bottle! We travel quite a bit and it’s really great to have while in the car. It fits easily in a bag/backpack. I have a small dog and he easily can drink out of it no problem. It is also leak proof!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jess&Chase

customer_reviews.title: Useful!
customer_reviews.text: The rubber seal between the top and bottom parts is flimsy and never seals correctly. But even so, it doesn’t leak TOO much. Also the wrist strap broke very early on. That being said my dog does use it all the time on walks and it’s very easy to clean and pack in a backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: I love this water bottle! I take my 3 month old toy poodle for walks at a nearby lake and when we get back to the car she’s always thirsty. Before, I would search my car to find something to pour water into but now I just pull out her little water bottle. So glad I bought this
customer_reviews.author: Kamesha

customer_reviews.title: perfect for long walks and hot days
customer_reviews.text: at first my chihuahua was apprehensive since he wasn’t sure why i was putting this weird looking thing in his face but i tried leaving his water bowl empty and only giving him water thru the bottle so that he’s forced to understand what it’s for, which didn’t take long; he gets excited when i pull it out now and there’s more than enough water for him. easy to use, the color is cute, and it feels very sturdy and well-made. makes us both very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Luna Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Convenient, cute, holds just the right amount of water and you don’t have to dump out what they don’t drink! We take it everywhere with our beagle.
customer_reviews.author: Dani

customer_reviews.title: Good for hiking
customer_reviews.text: I have a very stubborn dog. If I use a cup, sometimes he will have just one sip when I offer him water, and I have to waste the rest of the water. This solve the problem. It is a little dirty because you recycle the water, but when I am on hike, I don't want to carry too much, so I'm fine with it.
customer_reviews.author: Lin L.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.text: This is great for taking my dog to the park and making sure she stays hydrated. I worry that I'll bump the lock and it may leak, but other than that it seems to be super helpful and a great all-in-one pet hydration solution.
customer_reviews.author: LemonHoneyTea

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied buyer
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t really used the product but tested it out quickly the water still poured out even with the lock in but slowly. It is very possible that it may be user error as I did a quick test but either way I am happy I bought this it is very convenient for my fur babies
customer_reviews.author: Yazmin

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Leak
customer_reviews.text: This is so easy and carry around. I have purchased one for each of my cars. You can open it up and if my dog doesn't drink all of it, you can drain it back into the container.
customer_reviews.author: GODGIVZ

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my dog for when we go to the dog park, since there aren't a lot of places in the giant field to find water (bowl, natural, or spigot). Last weekend, my family went out looking for mushrooms, and we brought our dogs. This was a great way to have water on hand for the dogs while in the woods. I wish it carried a bit more water, but I can't complain at the convenience and ease of use!
customer_reviews.author: Paige Werner

customer_reviews.title: Leaks
customer_reviews.text: It has a lock button on it (or that’s what I assumed it was supposed to be)... apparently the lock button doesn’t do anything. This will leak. Not bad when you only fill up and empty at the park but don’t try to have it filled in the car.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Sueppel

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our puppy to easily get water on car trips and she loves it! We love it too! It is easy to use and makes it so easy for the puppy to drink some water.
customer_reviews.author: cheerupemokid99

customer_reviews.title: Check to make sure the unit is intact upon receipt of the order.
customer_reviews.text: I received with a broken interior piece and it leaked. I contacted the seller and they sent a replacement. The replacement works great. Practical for travel and the bowl is shaped just right for small puppies.
customer_reviews.author: Cass

customer_reviews.title: A nice option for not wasting water
customer_reviews.text: The rope handle broke the first week, which does make a difference in the ease of use. Otherwise a great little water bottle, especially when one likes to frequently offer water on walks. No matter how often those offerings are rejected.
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: not dishwasher safe
customer_reviews.text: I love this little product and it helps during car trips. Maybe it said somewhere, but its not dishwasher safe. The water vessel melted pretty badly. I can still use it but its way smaller than it used to be
customer_reviews.author: ladyluxe

customer_reviews.title: One-hand operation
customer_reviews.text: Elegant design, but the main thing - one-hand operation. Just push the button to pour some water into the dish part. Another, smaller button looks the main one, to prevent accidental spillage. Clever!
customer_reviews.author: Dr A

customer_reviews.title: Easy mess free
customer_reviews.text: Super cute, easy to use. The water also goes back too, but prob too gross to do that. My puppy loves it, I take it everywhere I take my dog. Does not leak! Material is great!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon L.

customer_reviews.title: Super convenient!
customer_reviews.text: This water bottle is great. The only thing I wish is that it held more water — but it’s easy to pour some of mine into the bowl so my dog can drink it and anything he leaves over I just hold the button and it can go back into the hw container. Super nice to have around! My dog also drinks way more from this than if I pour him a bowl when we’re out
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Doran

customer_reviews.title: Convenient for traveling
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my sister in law's dog because she takes her everywhere. She used it at a festival that we took the kids and her dog to and it was very convenient.
customer_reviews.author: SnyderFam
